TEXT.htm
FYI..
>>> <auto-reply@bop.gov> 7/17/2019 7:31 PM >>>
*******
This message was generated from an automated email account on www.bop.gov. Please do not reply to this message; you will not get a response.
If you have questions or concerns, please use the "Contact Us" area on the BOP website www.bop.gov/contact
TimeStamp: Wed Jul 17 19:31:25 EDT 2019
*******
A message from user
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
who sent an email from www.bop.gov.
I know this sounds like pure paranoia, But I have a strange feeling something might happen to Epstein, I've also heard
(b)(6), (b)(7)(C)
has recently been placed in the same institute.
2 Major alleged criminals in close proximity can be dangerous.
especially with 2 conflicting individuals who have a huge impact on our current environment.
I don't know about you but if I was an angry prisoner and was given an opportunity to hurt a child sex trafficker, as a parent, you never know what could.
All I'm asking is please take precaution and be careful.
I would prefer if his case goes to court, and he stays alive after his alleged cult-like island and all the people connected/ Involved to get the same.
[Location = New York MCC]
Page 3183
DOJ-OGR-00027151

I know this sounds like pure paranoia, But I have a strange feeling something might happen to Epstein, I've also heard (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) has recently been placed in the same institute.

especially with 2 conflicting individuals who have a huge impact on our current environment.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a forwarded email with redacted names and contains concerns about Jeffrey Epstein's safety in prison.
